feed.title: Ice Cubes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.59
entry.content:
• The tap on the post counter to scroll to the latest unread post is back.
  • You can now enable new posts streaming in the settings, itâ€™s not on by default.
  • Reworked a bit some settings to make them clearer.
  • Fix the home timeline restore from the marker API.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.11.0
entry.content:
• Adjusted the layout & design of the quick-access pills at the top of the timeline.
  • There is now a new option to disable compact layout at the bottom of the display settings. You can now enjoy Ice Cubes in a wider format!
  • Redesigned Share as image option, with a preview of the image. It also fixed a bug where it was sometimes capturing gray images.
  • The select text menu option will now select all the text by default.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.11.1
entry.content:
• Add more text formatting support on the rendering side.
  • Lists, sub-lists, bold and italic text will now be correctly rendered in the app.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.11.2
entry.content:
• Better list formatting on post content
  • New batch accept/reject notification requests.
  • Various other fixes.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.11.3
entry.content:
• Build with iOS 18.3 SDK
  • Fix various issues related to iOS 18.3 SwiftUI
  • Remove the GIPHY SDK
  • Fix #2266
  • Various other fixes
